org.easybatch.core.filter

Class FileExtensionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.filter.FileExtensionFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordFilter

    public class FileExtensionFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordFilter
    A filter that filters FileRecord having a payload file name ending with a given extension.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
